import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get OAuth Settings</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/api/v32.04/settings/oauth"}></MethodEndpoint>



```
x-prisma-cloud-target-env: {"permission":"authConfiguration","saas":false,"self-hosted":true}
x-public: true
```



Returns the OAuth configuration settings.

## cURL Request

Refer to the following example cURL request:

```bash
$ curl -k \
  -u <USER> \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -X GET \
  "https://<CONSOLE>/api/v<VERSION>/settings/oauth"
```

## cURL Response

Refer to the following example cURL response:

```bash
{
 "enabled": true,
 "clientID": "ef3a806a249a31b7d15e",
 "clientSecret": {
   "encrypted": "O27GsQ7PDX4LrVx6q+A7sMLUAKTbKU3DAYTZyaOhqTqdNwI7raKFCA3/RrmRPUgk"
 },
 "providerName": "github",
 "authURL": "https://github.com/login/oauth/authorize",
 "tokenURL": "https://github.com/login/oauth/access_token",
 "groupScope": "",
 "groupClaim": "",
 "userClaim": "",
 "cert": "",
 "openshiftBaseURL": "",
 "openIDIssuesURL": "",
 "providerAlias": "github_ss"
}
```

ProviderSettings are the Oauth/ OpenID Connect connectivity settings

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"authURL"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"AuthURL specifies auth URL.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"cert"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Cert is idp certificate.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"clientID"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"ClientID is the client identifier issued to the client during the registration process.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>clientSecret</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

Secret Stores the plain and encrypted version of a value. The plain version is not stored in a database

</div><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"encrypted"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Specifies an encrypted value of the text value of the secret.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"enabled"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} name={"providerAlias"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"ProviderAlias is the provider alias used for display.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"providerName"} required={false} schemaName={"identity.ProviderName (string)"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`github,openshift`]"} schema={{"description":"ProviderName is the identity provider name","enum":[["github","openshift"]],"type":"string","title":"identity.ProviderName"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"tokenURL"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"TokenURL specifies token URL.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"userClaim"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"UserClaim is the name of the user claim property.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples
